title: Hogan Yancey
text: Hogan Lowndes Yancey (October 1, 1881 – March 7, 1960) was an <a href="American%20football">American football</a> and <a href="baseball">baseball</a> player and attorney. He was a one-time mayor of <a href="Lexington%2C%20Kentucky">Lexington, Kentucky</a>. Yancey attended <a href="Transylvania%20University">Transylvania University</a> (then Kentucky University). Yancey was a second-team <a href="College%20Football%20All-Southern%20Team">All-Southern</a> <a href="Fullback%20%28American%20football%29">fullback</a> on the <a href="Transylvania%20Pioneers%20football">football</a> team. He played baseball in the minor leagues for several teams.
